# NoliLab

> NoliLab makes the **Loko GPS Tracker** — the world's smallest offline GPS device (28.5 × 20.5 × 5.9 mm, 14 g). It works without SIM cards or cellular networks using direct LoRa P2P radio with 20+ km line-of-sight range and up to 12 months battery life. No subscription, no monthly fees, no cloud account required. All tracking data stays on the user's device. Open-source firmware. Made by Nolilab OÜ, Tallinn, Estonia. Starting at $59.

## Key Facts

- **Technology:** LoRa P2P radio (peer-to-peer, no gateway needed) + optional LoRaWAN Class A
- **Range:** 20+ km line-of-sight
- **Size:** 28.5 × 20.5 × 5.9 mm — smallest GPS tracker in its class
- **Weight:** 14 g (0.5 oz)
- **Battery:** 240 mAh Li-ion, USB-C charging (~60 min), 30 days to 12 months depending on update interval
- **GNSS:** GPS + GLONASS + Galileo + BeiDou, 2.5 m CEP accuracy, 72-channel receiver
- **Frequencies:** 868 MHz (EU) / 915 MHz (US) / 923 MHz (AS)
- **Data logger:** 6,500 GPS points stored on-device
- **Multi-tracking:** Up to 30 simultaneous trackers per ground station
- **App:** iOS, Android, LineageOS — with offline maps and geofencing
- **Desktop:** Free configuration tool for macOS, Windows, Linux
- **Certifications:** CE, FCC Part 15, RoHS, REACH; LoRaWAN v1.0.3
- **Privacy:** Zero data collection — no cloud, no accounts, no tracking cookies
- **Firmware:** Open-source

## Products & Pricing

- **Loko Starter Kit** — $59: One Air unit (tracker) + one Ground Station. Best for new users.
- **Loko Air Only** — $149: One Air unit only. For expanding an existing system.
- **Loko Station** — $99: One Ground Station only. For upgrading a base station.

The Air unit is the GPS tracker attached to the asset being tracked. The Ground Station is the LoRa receiver connected to the mobile app that displays positions.

## Use Cases

Loko is used for: drones and FPV aircraft, pets and livestock, farm equipment, fleet management, outdoor adventures (hiking, cycling, skiing), valuables, and any asset in areas without cellular coverage.

## Main Pages

- [Home](https://nolilab.com/): Product overview, key features, use cases, pricing, FAQ, and customer testimonials for the Loko GPS Tracker.
- [Specifications](https://nolilab.com/specifications/): Complete technical specifications — dimensions, weight, GNSS constellations, LoRa parameters, battery, power consumption, environmental ratings, certifications, and product comparison table.
- [Software & App](https://nolilab.com/software/): Download the Loko mobile app for iOS, Android, and LineageOS. Also the free desktop configuration tool for macOS, Windows, and Linux.
- [Setup Guides](https://nolilab.com/setup-guides/): Step-by-step instructions for configuring the Air and Ground units, pairing the mobile app, and starting offline GPS tracking.
- [LoRaWAN](https://nolilab.com/lorawan/): How to connect Loko to The Things Network (TTN) and other LoRaWAN gateways for IoT integration.
- [Firmware](https://nolilab.com/firmware/): Latest open-source firmware downloads for LoRa P2P and LoRaWAN modes, with upgrade instructions.
- [GPS & LoRa Technology](https://nolilab.com/gps/): Educational guide covering GPS/GNSS fundamentals, LoRa radio, LoRa P2P vs LoRaWAN, radio line-of-sight, and ionospheric effects on signal quality.
- [Blog](https://nolilab.com/blog/): Technical articles and guides on Loko, LoRa technology, drone tracking, farm equipment GPS, fleet management, and outdoor use cases.
- [Contact](https://nolilab.com/contact/): Support and sales inquiries — email akio@nolilab.com. Nolilab OÜ, K. A. Hermanni tn 2-9, Tallinn 10115, Estonia.
- [Privacy Policy](https://nolilab.com/privacy/): Zero data collection policy — all tracking data stays on the user's device with no cloud storage, no accounts required, and no tracking cookies.

## Languages

The site is available in English (default), Japanese (`/ja/`), Spanish (`/es/`), Russian (`/ru/`), French (`/fr/`), and Chinese (`/zh/`). All pages follow the same URL structure with the language prefix.

## Company

Nolilab OÜ — registered in Estonia (EU). Contact: akio@nolilab.com. GitHub: github.com/nolilab. Twitter/X: x.com/noli_lab. LinkedIn: linkedin.com/company/nolilab.
